name: Trickstar Colchica
text:
1 non-Link "Trickstar" monster
You can only Special Summon "Trickstar Colchica(s)" once per turn. When a monster(s) is destroyed by a battle involving your "Trickstar" monster while this card is in your GY: You can banish this card, then target 1 of those destroyed monsters; inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK it had on the field. You can only use this effect of "Trickstar Colchica" once per turn.
